body:
Content here was boring, so I decided to remove it.

My name is Alex, I live in Berlin and mostly try to have fun, or I just imagine it... Overall my life goal is to conquer this planet and make everybody smile. 

I've made some nice tools, like [dust4j](http://dust4j.noroutine.me/) and [Tobacco](http://tobacco.noroutine.me/) - pretty useful stuff I think... 

When I feel so, I also eventually write to [Please blog](http://please.noroutine.me). Be careful - sometimes it's in Russian, sometimes in Ukrainian, sometimes in Java, sometimes in English, I warned you ;)

Anyway, you are somehow landed here and probably want to jump out somewhere else, so I just left my [LinkedIn Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/oleksiykhilkevich) as a portal for you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Noroutine Pages
